location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Circular N. 4291 of the Territorial Department Revenue from the Officiating Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, Charles Edward Fraser Tytler, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Circular N. 4291 of the Territorial Department Revenue from the Officiating Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, Charles Edward Fraser Tytler, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf, forwarding letters, memoranda and reports on employment and promotions of native servants.
